name: Lucky Star Slots - Free Classic Vegas Slots
name_original: Lucky Star Slots - Free Classic Vegas Slots
description:
***** WIN THE BIGGEST JACKPOTS IN LUCKY STAR SLOTS! *****
Lucky Star Slots is everything you love about simple, free, and classic 3 reel slots games. Experience that downtown Las Vegas feel right in the palm of your hand!

**** Game Features ****
- Head to the casino floor and play Lucky Star Slots!
- All of our classic 3-reel slot machines have huge jackpots!
- Collect your daily and hourly bonus coins - for free!
- Enjoy single-line free slot machines with bars, triple sevens, diamonds, and cherries!
- No-internet and no-wifi required. Play offline!
- Huge VIP rewards coming soon!

If you are looking for a great free slots game, you're going to love playing Lucky Star Slots!

Like our games? Leave us a 5-star review. Your feedback is appreciated.

This game is intended for an adult audience and does not offer real money gambling or an opportunity to win real money or prizes. Practice or success at social gaming does not imply future success at real money gambling.
